title: Let FKA Twigs’s ‘Holy Terrain’ Music Video Hypnotize You
text:
Sign us up for whatever cult FKA twigs leads in her new music video “Holy Terrain.” The artist commands her dancers in a desolate desert, singing about what it takes to be with her. Take her to her favorite show, hold her hand, take her to a deep river, and other things we are ready and willing to do. Especially considering how hypnotizing her heterochromatic contact lenses and the rippling camera movements prove to be. The music video is directed both by Twigs and her frequent collaborator Nick Walker. The song, “Holy Terrain,” features Future and was produced by — wait for it — Skrillex and — wait one more time — Jack Antonoff, as well as Twigs herself. It’s a collab that truly reaches all corners of music. “Holy Terrain” comes ahead of FKA Twigs’s album ﻿Magdalene. Prepare your altars for when it arrives on October 25.

Related
description: FKA Twigs hypnotizes in her music video for “Holy Terrain,” featuring Future. The new song was produced by Jack Antonoff and Skrillex.
